item.title: Obstruction of parked cars when pulling out of car park, 29th December
item.description:
When you are pulling out of residents parking, the parked cars block the view - sometimes both ways and stops you from safely pulling out. I have witnessed some near misses from people pulling out of this alley. View is obstructed by street parking.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hatherley Road, Longlands, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bird fouling on drive and pavement causing health and slip hazard, 29th December
item.description:
A council-owned alder tree overhangs my driveway and is causing persistent bird fouling. This is damaging vehicles and creating a slip hazard and a health hazard. There are piles of bird faces regularly and most days. I’m requesting an inspection for crown thinning or selective pruning to reduce roosting above the drive of 129.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Palace View, Widmore, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Steer cleaning in Lakeside, 29th December
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 9, Lake Side, Greater London
